entry.title: Jade Pizza Slice
entry.content: I like casting into a sit a lot. I think I can get it better, it's sort of similar to beats in trap. [[video:jade-pizza-slice]]

entry.title: Voice Recorder Page
entry.content:
I added a voice recorder app Voice Recorder

It's browser-only, nothing gets uploaded anywhere.

  • ask for mic permission
  • record audio
  • draw a little waveform while it‚Äôs recording
  • let you play it back locally
  • Saving might be broken

Eventually I want the visualizer to look more interesting and also have pitch bands

I have other silly app ideas too, feel free to message or dm about them if you want to collab or have suggestions

entry.title: Nut Tricks
entry.summary: I need to make a nutt compilation
entry.content:
Just some cute crow vids recently! Crows do all sorts of neat stuff with their beaks and nuts. [[video:nut-spit]] [[video:nut-pop]]

Catgirl has named the balcony friends Boogie and Woogie. They're very silly together. [[video:boogie-and-woogie]]

[[video:eat-off-scooter]]

I just can't get over how cute Groof is [[video:cute-groof]] [[video:egg-fumble-but-saved]]

entry.title: Second L3
entry.summary: No Catgirl üòø also I need to fix the cropping maybe
entry.content:
Catgirl was going to be away but cancelled her flight due to weather, and couldn't get into the class I had signed up for.

It was my second L3 class, and my first with Jana. She checked that I was new in the beginning of class and had a dancey warmup and her sillyness quickly put me at ease, and I feel like I was able to do a lot more than if I were feeling too anxious. I didn't really think about that until the end. I missed having Catgirl to look at though.

My legs are pretty bruised but I really like L3, and how it feels challenging and rewarding.

[[video:layback-handstand-sit]]

entry.title: Silly Crow Loses an Egg
entry.summary: Too curious about what might be in the wrapper
entry.content:
Maybe they were waiting for their friend to take it? I love how they walk off at the end, as if they weren't keeping the egg for later. Or maybe they weren't, and they wanted to share it. But the way the other crow snatches it away seems like they thought they were being sneaky.

[[video:crow-egg-snack-steal-distracted]]

entry.title: Groof Time
entry.content:
Pretty Groof

Groof and Groofriend bungling an egg [[video:groof-groofriend-egg-bungle]] [[video:groofriend-egg-bungle]]

Groof tripping on a brick ahhhhhh [[video:groof-trip]]

entry.title: RIP 2025
entry.summary: Trying to organize for the new year
entry.content:
Previously,

I lost my old 2025 intentions unfortunately but I think I did well? I feel a lot better about cooking and have had a lot of fun cooking with Catgirl, which I was super nervous about at first. I managed to get into L3 pole which wasn't even a goal. I didn't run as much as I wanted, but came pretty close to 1000 miles, and that was a pretty artificial goal anyway. I got surgery, a tattoo, and new holes. 1 out 1 to 2025.

2026 üçî

I still want to keep doing my regular stuff like running and pole and trap.

  • Make a video game
  • Sew regularly
  • Make some 3D art
  • Drag Catgirl to more pinball tournaments so I can see her be hot
  • Write a crow guide
  • Make a personal and maybe duo pole choreo
  • Make a good breakfast burrito
  • Figure out and maybe acquire new tattoo
  • Drink more water üôÉ
  • Terror of Mecha Godzillo
  • Get more Wonka scores
  • Keep in touch with friends better
  • Clean old junk in apartment and maybe look up new one
  • Do more drug tolerance breaks
  • Improve blog design
  • Make a plan for getting these things done

2025 was a surprisingly good year for me, if a bit tiring, so I'm not looking to make revolutionary changes to things. I might update this as I remember more intentions.

entry.title: Some Comics
entry.summary: Geoff (hard) made a comic of Catgirl blowing up our farm!
entry.content: I love these so much they're so precious ‚ô•

entry.title: Cathat
entry.summary: Panther catsitting is over, here's some extremely good Panther content üò∫
entry.content:
Catgirl and I were both blessed with a cathat!!!

Even taking out the garbage is fun. Making mundane choores into something to look forward to with a friend is so special. [[video:panther-garbage]]

Merp and Berp shared a breakfast and Panther approved of crow treats [[video:panther-balcony-crows]]

I was so worried about him being lonely or sick in the beginning of the catsitting, but by the end he settled in so well. He had a great appetite too. He still seemed to miss mommy and his friends, understandably, but most of his meows seemed to be for more treats.

We went on patrols every day and made so many precious new silly memories, this time with Catgirl üòªüòªüòª. I honestly thought that I had already had my last Panther vacation but he still has so much more love to share with everyone apparently.

[[carousel:label=Extras; media/images/panther-wifi.avif|wifi cat; media/images/panther-hold.avif|He's a baby; media/images/panther-silly-ears.avif|So silly!; media/images/panther-stare-from-bed.avif|He dandered up my bed a lot, I still need to wash the sheets; media/images/panther-with-bungle-bee.avif|I gave him some friends but they mostly got in his way; media/images/catgirl-panther-me-selfie.avif|Me and Catgirl and Panther ‚ù§; ]] 6 images

entry.title: Sexy Choreo
entry.summary: It's just the name of the class, but I did try to make it sexy.
entry.content:
Catgirl and I did a sexy choreo class at SPD. We were both nervous, especially about the possiblity of having to do an improv in front of the class which happens sometimes at SPD. I really liked it though, and the warmups did a good job of hypnotizing us into sexy gooey mode.

Looking at the video, I definitely thought I was moving more fluidly and slowly. The bits on the floor especially felt more exaggreated than they look, so I really want to practice the froggy-grinds. I'm really proud of us üò∫.

[[video:pole-sexy-choreo]]

entry.title: Panther Time, One More Time
entry.summary: He's so old and confused and in pain, but still so so pretty and charming and I love him so much
entry.content:
I'm catsitting Big P for a week while Diane does xmus in Portland. I think this is the first time he's been over since he lost his hearing. It seems to have a big effect on him. He mustn't be able to know who's around and doesn't know when he'll get to see mommy or the kittens again. Every time I see him he's a bit slower and sicker looking and now he meows a LOT and probably can't even hear himself and it shreds my heart into a horrible miserable pulp. I want him to feel safe and comfy so badly and I feel so helpless and explode into tears constantly.

I know he's lived a good cat life, one of the best probably. He's friends with everyone and such a comfort and deserves so much himself. He still has strong paws for grabbing treats from me and remembered how to get to my apartment from the elevator. Despite everything, he's still chugging along and expanding my capacity for love and appreciation of cute moments.

We got visited by Merp and Berp (?) briefly on my balcony, but couldn't get Panther's attention since he can't hear them. They were only around for a moment and I didn't want to startle them.

[[video:panther-meow]]

Tysm to Catgirl for helping out a ton and offering so much necessary love and comfort.

entry.title: Very Silly Crows
entry.content:
The Great Egg Bamboozle

This is one of my new favorites. I just turned around and Groof's egg was gone! And then I turned around again and suddenly Groof is right there. They're so swift and quiet.

[[video:groof-egg-bamboozle]]

Groof also has a very cute tube trot [[video:groof-tube-trot]]

Longlegs Gets Bapped

Longlegs likes putting eggs in puddles for some reason. I think they're just used to putting food in water to make it easier to eat. Their friend Fussy disagrees and baps them in the head! I looks like a friendly bap at least. [[video:longlegs-puddle-egg-bungle]]

I also tried putting treats on a bike seat to see what would happen, but Fussy couldn't hold on very well. I didn't get a video, but Longlegs also was sliding down some parking gizmo due to the rain. [[video:fussy-bike-seat-slide]]

entry.title: Pole High Five
entry.content:
I think my side superhero is doing alright? We also did flying angels which I did not feel comfortable getting a video of. My home pole doesn't really have enough space for it üò¢.

[[video:pole-high-five]]

entry.title: Lost Stash in Leaves
entry.summary: I forget where I put stuff too :(
entry.content:
This was outside Rubenstein's while I was eating a bagel. I had stashed a bunch of treats for 3 nearby crows who were all very excited and very very hungry. They restashed a bunch of the treats, and this one either couldn't remember where they stashed them, or was just hoping to get lucky maybe.

[[video:crow-stash-in-leaves]] [[video:crow-turning-over-leaves]] [[video:crow-searching-leaves-curb]] [[video:crow-digging-at-curb]]

entry.title: First L3 Pole
entry.summary: Catgirl and I went to our first L3 with Naoko
entry.content:
The class was fun and encouraging but also painful and difficult. We ended up at the front of the class for some reason despite being early. This meant I got to see an exciting mini show from Naoko before class as she tried some combo someone else was talking to her about. It's such an exciting bonus to class. Also holey moley there's some baddies in class. I guess all the levels have that, but they're new baddies and considerably more conditioned. It's difficult to imagine L4/5.

It turns out Naoko's L3 alternates between spin and static? At least I think that's what the situation is. Being a spin class made it more difficult but I needed the refresher.

L2 seemed to be focused a lot on invertaing and L3 seems like that will be replaced with aerial inverts. There's an intermediate inversions class that might help.

I look pretty weird from it being after xgiving, and also because I forgot to bring my shorts (‚ùì‚ùì‚ùì) so I panic bought some red ones from the store. I don't really like them and regret not just using my underpants, though that might have been a bungle too.

[[video:pole-bungled-archer]] [[video:pole-archer-broken-pegasus]] [[video:pole-spin-archer-broken-pegasus]]

I want to practice these some more, but also I really jammed my right foot. I think I'm not orienting it properly from the videos.

entry.title: Xgiving Gooning Comic
entry.summary:
Scene from Xgiving.
Erin is peeping at us üëÄ

entry.title: Messy Fussy
entry.content:
Fussy is Longleg's friend. Longlegs is more of a stasher, Fussy likes to make big messes and only eats their favorite treats

[[video:fussy-egg-mess]]

entry.title: Xgiving
entry.content:
X-day

Catgirl and I went to the Phair Castle, along with Diane, Laura, Brianna, and I think that's it?

I got super stressed about getting ready, but Catgirl was very accomodating. I was originally going to workout with Ben, but I didn't have enough time and abandoned that idea.

It turned out that everyone was running late anyway, which is what I think happens every year but I always forget.


At the Phair castle

I got super drained of battery from being around kids. Julia started tackling me which was fun and cute but exhausting.

It was Catgirl's first time meeting Pixel, and it went as expected. Pixel was friendly for a bit and then got swipey.

‚ö† Caught Gooning

The Phair Castle has a nice little nook in Ben's office that we snuck into. We thought it was private because there's curtains to cover the entrance and the door to the room was closed.

Unfortunately, there was a window looking right into it from the balcony and Erin was peeping at us for an unknown amount of time. It remains a mystery as to how much she saw, but there was a decent amout to see imo. I think Catgirl was mostly amused but was a little self-conscious üòü.

XX-day

On Friday, Catgirl and I visited Diane's with Eggy Jeff, Dirty Jeff, and Landy. I didn't take photos of them, but I got a bunch of Panther.

[[carousel:label=Selfies with Panther and Catgirl; media/images/xgiving-looking-at-catgirl.avif|Looking at Catgirl; media/images/xgiving-gobbo-food.avif|Food time; media/images/xgiving-goblin-panther-catgirl.avif|With Panther and Catgirl;]] 3 images

Catgirl drew a little cat face on his collar, which had been blank for too long.

We also gave Panther a bath! He obviously didn't like it and eventually let out a sad yowl üòø. Dirty Jeff used soap instead of baby shampoo, so I hope his fur is okay. Catgirl and I used the blowdryer on him after, and he seemed to like it. He got into a very satisfied looking cat-pear pose üçê.

[[carousel:label=Panther at xgiving; media/images/xgiving-panther-with-collar.avif|So handsome!; media/images/xgiving-panther-cuddle.avif|Cuddle time; media/images/xgiving-panther-fireplace.avif|Toasty kitty;]] 3 images

Pole Practice

I got to do a few shapes at Diane's house. I kicked a cushion in the second video.

[[video:xgiving-pole-leg-hang]] [[video:xgiving-pole-spins]]

I don't remember this context but it's cute

We must have been moseying around in the moist for a bit?

entry.title: Balcony Visitor
entry.summary: Merp(?) I think came by for some peanuts!
entry.content:
I heard a plink and saw them grabbing peanuts, and dropping a few too. I had seen them earlier outside my building, but didn't have many treats with me because Long Legs and Fussy and Groof were very hungry crows. I hope they come again üò∏

[[video:crow-balcony-visit]]

entry.title: Catamari
entry.summary: Catgirl and I visit Panther and Diane to get big
entry.content:
Everyone loves Panther so much! He meowed a bunch to go on a patrol, but we needed to wait for Catgirl and Diane to finish the Katamari level, or else he wouldn't leave the doorway.

[[carousel:label=Panther Friend; media/images/panther-catgirl-catlady.avif|I love kitties so much; media/images/eloise-panther-couch-1.avif|Me and Panther; media/images/eloise-panther-couch-2.avif|Me and Panther üò∫;]] 3 images

Poor Panther has lost his hearing it seems. I'm so glad he still seems like a happy cat. Maybe his hearing loss is related to him wanting to hang out with everyone, so he could be alterted to any sort of interesting events that he otherwise might not hear.

Katamari looks really fun but I didn't play too much. Catgirl got me real loopy, and I had trouble reading the text on the screen, and also got very distracted by Panther.

Diane later commented on how skinny Panther looks in the photos and how she misses her sack of potatoes which made me pretty sad, but I'm glad he's still hanging out with us and being dopey. I think it's important to be dopey.

Kitten Kartwheel

At the end, we were visited by the kittens who were happy to display their acrobatics. [[video:kitten-cartwheel]]

entry.title: Wavey Heels
entry.summary:
Wiggled around for heels class.
I really like the butt move at the end.
entry.content: Butt move needs a lot of practice though. [[video:heels-wavey]]

entry.title: The Groof Toll
entry.summary: Took a wrong turn and Groof wanted more treats
entry.content:
Groof's mouth is already full of treats! I had walked up a little to leave treats on the ramp, but both Groof and Groofriend landed so that I would have to pass them on the way back down. Groof does some good flappy hops.

[[video:groof-toll]]

entry.title: Passed L3 Pole Test
entry.content:
Aileen, our instructor, seemed unimpressed but sympathetic to how tired we were. I bungled my crucifix, partially because I haven't been practicing my left side like a bozo.

I had been wanting to take the L3 test before the end of 2025. Now I need to muster the courage to actually go to an L3 class. It seems scary and I mostly wanted to take the test just to know I could pass it. L2 still feels really difficult at times. I want to work towards L2 choreo or heels next, I think.

The leg hangs feel pretty okay now... I almost typed "easy" but they're not easy yet. The first time I tried an inside leg hang, it hurt so much. There's a lot of pole moves like that I suppose.

Some flailing I did today:

[[video:chopper-outside-leg-hang-thigh-hold-butterfly-thigh-hang]] [[video:outside-inside-leg-hang-genie]] [[video:flatline]]

entry.title: Purple Groof
entry.content:
I'm not sure what causes them to look like this, I think the angle of the sun? Maybe I should look up the time of day I took it and try again. It adds to my suspicion that crows see UV light and is maybe part of how they tell each other apart.

[[video:groof-purple]]

entry.title: Some Pole Moves
entry.content:
Feeling better with all of these! Handstand is still scarey, but I feel like my figurehead is improving. Catgirl is looking good too, but having trouble getting her long beautiful legs over for the reiko üòç.

Oh, I also need to remember to look to the outside for chair spins, it seemed to help a lot and it looks pretty. I feel like I might try to test into L3 soon.

[[video:pole-reiko-figurehead]][[video:pole-handstand-cupid]]

entry.title: Won a (tiny) Pin Tournament
entry.summary: Only 8 people, but my first win in a long time!
entry.content:
I was walking into Shorty's and I got bamboozled by Dwayne telling me it was 7 people and just about to start. I lost my first match to a complete n00b which was worrysome, and second to Sergey.

I don't know how I got ranked so highly, I think it's an artifact of not competing very often. Sergey is definitely a level above me. You can just tell when someone's average scores are beating your top scores. I got kinda lucky in my match against him, but that's how it goes.

entry.title: Big Baby Panther
entry.content:
The Babby Hold

I had been catsitting Panther, and he kept trying to find a spot to hang out while I was working. He kept sitting in weird corners on top of cables, and didn't want to sit on cushions for some reason. I thought maybe he would sit in my lap if I had pillow and awkwardly hoisted him up, and it was an accident that he ended up in this position. I didn't even have my phone on me, so this was actually taken with an ipad(?) I had lying around.

[[video:panther-baby-hold]]

entry.title: Some Plushies
entry.content:
I made these a while ago, and just saw the sushi friend again. I gave it to my friend's kid at some point. They're missing the seaweed wrap ‚òπ but was assured it exists somewhere in their massive pile of stuffies.

Also here's an eyeball I made for a 3yo's birthday. It's supposed to be dianoga but I didn't make the tentacle part. You can stuff it in your sleeve and use it like a puppet though. I made it super quickly and it's not the best quality but am proud of how fast it came out. [[video:plush-eyeball]]

entry.title: Bio Page
entry.summary: I added a bio page (the about link). It's fun to make, and doesn't really explain why I'm making this blog or anything but maybe I'll add that too.
entry.content: It's here

entry.title: PSO Day
entry.summary: We saw the L5 drama / entertainment / championship categories this last weekend
entry.content:
Pole for the Hole

A bunch of our instructors were performing which was so cool to see. It's like we only get little clues about how they might look when performing from their classes. I was too shy to talk to any of them though.

We were way far back which made it a little difficult to see. Eventually Catgirl and I moved up a single row which felt surprisingly better. It was funny overhearing Dirty Jeff talk about all the judging rules with Diane.

I'm really glad I went again and that I got to bring Catgirl and that she liked it too. It's so inspiring to see all the babes being so extra and trying their hardest to be expressive. I think it's difficult to feel like yourself, and also difficult to figure out what you're even supposed to feel like, and pole has been a really great environment for exploring that.

New Fit

I also got a new pole fit that Diane complimented how it shaped my boobs.

Then we did superheroes in class and now my thighs are sore and gnarly looking üòø.

entry.title: Catgirl Blows Up the Farm
entry.content:
She had just been talking about how she might blow it up when I least expect. I was looking at a chest and she noticed and knew I wouldn't expect it immedately after mentioning it.

[[video:catgirl-blowing-up-the-farm]] She's visible through the menu, and a big red orb appears and she scurries away üòº

entry.title: Crow Butt
entry.summary: What a cutie! They were pretty scared of the bag and kept peeping in.
entry.content: Such pretty tail feathers too

entry.title: Egg
entry.content:
I think they can't hold it down due to their foot? I smooshed the egg up for them a little, and then they were able to fly off with it. They had already stashed a bunch of peanuts too. Longlegs is happy to receive a lot of treats it seems.

[[video:longlegs-cant-grab-egg]]

entry.title: Egg Teacher
entry.summary: One crow teaching another how to do egg
entry.content:
I think this might be Groof's honker? Really hard to say. I thought they were Groof at first because they recognized me, but they're super scared of the egg and tube and Groof just went at the tube yesterday.

After they peck the egg, they walk off to the side and give me a sad crow look pretty similar to what Groof does üòø [[video:scaredy-crow]]

A different crow, maybe Groof? comes and helps them with chatters of encouragement. [[video:crow-encouragement]] [[video:egg-tube-extract]]

Part of why I think they're a juvenile is how excited their lil' trots are. Egg Drop is one of my favorite special crow moves. I need to make a list of them all. [[video:egg-drop]]

entry.title: Power Pecks
entry.content:
I just sit down on a bench, and Groof shows up! [[video:wait-for-groof]]

This is the first time I've seen Groof pierce the tube. I like seeing them use their feet manipulate stuff. They got a ton of treats today. [[video:groof-power-pecks]]

Maybe they get peck practice in when they take the tubes to the Groof roof.

entry.title: Groofy morning
entry.summary: Groof/friend get a tube and an egg
entry.content:
Some dork passed by which was funny [[video:groof-ped-dont-see-everyday]]

Groof pecking at the tube. Do they just like pecking? It does look satisfying. Good pecks. [[video:groof-peck-at-tube]][[video:groof-tube-heist]]

Groof leaves with egg while Groofriend distracts me. Looking back at the video, it was kind of obvious that Groof was about to knock the egg off. [[video:groof-egg-heist]]

entry.title: Panther wakes up
entry.summary: One of my favorite videos of him
entry.content:
A long time ago when I was catsitting. The sound when he shakes his head is amazing. It takes him a while to find the kibbles.

[[video:panther-wake-up-to-kibbles]]

entry.title: #2 on Stranger Things üí©
entry.summary: Got this a few days ago. Check out the big bonus üçÜüçÜüçÜ
entry.content:
I got total isolation #2 which I'm not sure I've ever done before. Also felt pretty close to getting 11 drawings. [[video:stranger-things-elo]]

I keep telling Catgirl how important the rollovers are. [[video:stranger-things-bonus]]

entry.title: Heels Combo
entry.content:
It's short, but I like the movements. I should practice this at home some again.

[[video:smile-heels]]

entry.title: Squirrel Attack!
entry.content:
I was at the kitty loft waiting for her to come home from surg and went out to visit her crow friends. They ate all the peanuts I had!

I saw the squirrel to the side and was thinking they were dangerous but they still got me off guard. Sometimes I see them on reddit getting along with crows, but now I know they're a hazard.

Afterwards I went back to the kitty loft and got more treats for them.

[[video:squirrel-attack]]

entry.title: It's Green Bandit
entry.summary: I only see them maybe once a month? Glad too see they're doing well üòä
entry.content:
This is Green Bandit, who I assume is research crow from UW. They seem pretty friendly. I've seen crows with the green bands maybe a dozen times now, but not sure if they're all the same crow. [[video:green-bandit-greeting]]

Green Bandit can carry two peanuts, but not three, so they call their friend for help. They can caw with their beak full of peanuts apparently! But honkers need to use their whole body to honk. Also it seems like pigeons have started sensing that I have food, but they probably can't open peanuts or eggs. [[video:green-bandit-calls-for-assistance]]

Their friend heisted the egg away. Maybe they've had a gobbo egg before? [[video:friend-of-green-bandit-egg-heist]]

entry.title: Catgirl & Goblin at the Aquarium
entry.content: We got loopy at the aquarium but didn't take a photo, so Catgirl made these. It was an incredibly lovely day. Played pin and ate hotdogs and did L2 pole and watched anime and drank hot chocolate and other things too probably.

entry.title: Wiggly Compass
entry.content:
I was running late so I didn't wear a matching outfit which is why it's b&w. I was toast at this point, we had done a lot of leg hang switches and the instructor was like "a lot of you are looking at your legs sadly so let's do something different". It did feel pretty good but I was low on arm strength. Also I have a bruise on my hip that's making hangs get into my pocket kind of tough.

[[video:wiggly-compass]]

entry.title: Swooped by Longlegs
entry.content:
I didn't they were Longlegs until Catgirl pointed out their injured foot. It felt like it had been a while since I had seen them, but I think I just wasn't identifying them.

They're so friendly! So exciting when they get close. I reacted too slowly to catch the swoop by my head on video.

[[video:longlegs-swoop]] [[video:longlegs-approach]] [[video:longlegs-hop]]

entry.title: 1.2B on GZ & Planet X Qualified
entry.content:
I saw a tech messing with it a few weeks ago due to a switch being stuck down causing scores to go up continually, so I assume they reset it. 1.2B is good for me but won't last.

I beat Titanosaurous, Gigan, and Ghidorah I think, but didn't get much on the Ghidora fight. Then Monster Zero started before Planet X, which I don't actually know how to start. Pretty nice to feel like it's close though.

117M Carnage was pretty good too üòà

[[video:gz-gc-shortys]]

entry.title: Cat Coin Purse
entry.summary: I made a coin purse for Catgirl
entry.content:
Catgirl printed out Cat's face onto stablizer for me so I used it to make a coin purse.

Demo opening the zipper [[video:cat-purse-demo]]

I used blender to create the sewing pattern

entry.title: The Merp-Dump
entry.content:
Merp likes to shake all the treats out of bags. It's one of the ways I identify them! They are looking very pretty today. Berp was also around to pick up stray treats.

[[video:merp-dump]]

entry.title: The Three Peanut Problem
entry.summary: How to carry away 3 peanuts at once?
entry.content:
They couldn't do it üò¢

[[video:three-peanut-problem]]

entry.title: Leg Hang Workshop
entry.content:
My inside leg hangs are feeling much better now. Maybe even better than outside.

Things to remember:

  • Go in the hip pocko
  • Remove inside arm first(?)
  • Do a goblin squat for insides, don't do full invert
  • Switches go: inside -> pike -> outside -> pike etc.
  • Push outside leg into pole
  • Open chest, use this to hold back into position correctly

[[video:leg-hang-switch]]

Catgirl took this video of me ‚ô• [[video:leg-hang-switch-gwen-pov_hq]]

entry.title: Grabby Groof
entry.content:
Groof and Groofriend vying for treats

Groof is the slightly larger one with a rounder beak, and the instigator.

[[video:groof-grab]] [[video:groof-caw-at-groofriend]] [[video:groofriend-snips-at-groof]]

Groof wants more

I love the cute groof look. [[video:groof-wants-more]]

entry.content:

entry.title: Hop hop hop
entry.content:
I think the hoppy one is Longlegs, and the other is Fussy? The peanut crow was never able to pick up 3 peanuts at once.
